00021     EncodedData::EncodedData(DataFormat format)
00022     {
00023         _andOperator = 3;
00024         _swap = 2;
00025         _arrayCount = 0;
00026         _byteCount = 0;
00027         _format = format;
00028         _car = 0;
00029     }
00030 
00031     EncodedData::EncodedData(const QByteArray bytes)
00032     {
00033         _andOperator = 3; // 2 bits
00034         _swap = 2;
00035         _arrayCount = 0;
00036         _byteCount = 0;
00037         _format = BYTES;
00038         _bytes = bytes;
00039     }
00040 
00041     EncodedData::EncodedData(const quint32 size)
00042     {
00043         _andOperator = 3;
00044         _car = 0;
00045         _swap = 2;
00046         _arrayCount = 0;
00047         _byteCount = 0;
00048         _format = UINT32;
00049 
00050         for(int i=0; i<=24; i+=8)
00051         {
00052             uchar car = (char)((size >> i)&255);
00053             _bytes.append(car);
00054         }
00055     }
00056 
00057     EncodedData::EncodedData(const QString& str, DataFormat format)
00058         : _format(format)
00059     {
00060         _andOperator = 3; // 2 bits
00061         _swap = 2;
00062         _arrayCount = 0;
00063         _byteCount = 0;
00064 
00065         if(_format == UTF8)
00066             _bytes = str.toUtf8();
00067         else if(_format == LATIN1)
00068             _bytes = str.toLatin1();
00069         else if(_format == ASCII)
00070             _bytes = str.toAscii();
00071     }

00099     {
00100         _bytes.clear();

00103     void EncodedData::initialize(unsigned short int nbBits)
00104     {
00105         _swap = nbBits;
00106         _andOperator = andOperator(_swap);
00107         _arrayCount = 0;
00108         _byteCount = 0;
00109         if(_bytes.size()>0)
00110             _car = _bytes.at(0);
00111     }
00112 
00113     bool EncodedData::hasNext()
00114     {
00115         if(_bytes.size()==0)
00116             return false;
00117         else
00118             return (_arrayCount < (unsigned int)_bytes.size());
00119     }
00120 
00121     int EncodedData::read()
00122     {
00123         int val = 0;
00124         if(hasNext())
00125         {
00126             val = _car&_andOperator;
00127 
00128             if(_byteCount+_swap >= 8)
00129             {
00130                 _byteCount = 0;
00131                 if(_arrayCount < (unsigned int)_bytes.size()-1)
00132                     _car = _bytes.at( _arrayCount+1 );
00133                 _arrayCount++;
00134             }
00135             else
00136             {
00137                 _car = _car >> _swap;
00138                 _byteCount += _swap;
00139             }
00140         }
00141         return val;
00142     }
00143 
00144     void EncodedData::append(int val)
00145     {
00146         _car += (val << _byteCount);
00147         if(_byteCount+_swap >=8)
00148         {
00149             _bytes.append(_car);
00150             _arrayCount++;
00151             _byteCount = 0;
00152             _car = 0;
00153         }
00154         else
00155         {
00156             _byteCount += _swap;
00157         }
00158     }
00159 
00160     quint32 EncodedData::toUInt32() const
00161     {
00162         quint32 size = 0;
00163         for(int i=0; i<_bytes.size() && i<4; i++)
00164             size += ((uchar)_bytes.at(i))<<(i*8);
00165 
00166         return size;
00167     }
00168 
00169     QString EncodedData::toString(DataFormat format) const
00170     {
00171         DataFormat dataFormat = _format;
00172         if(format!=F_UNDEF)
00173             dataFormat = format;
00174 
00175         if(dataFormat == UTF8)
00176             return QString::fromUtf8(_bytes.data());
00177         else if(dataFormat == LATIN1)
00178             return QString::fromLatin1(_bytes.data());
00179         else if(dataFormat == ASCII)
00180             return QString::fromAscii(_bytes.data());
00181 
00182         return "unsupported format for datas decoding.";
00183     }
00184 
00185     unsigned short int EncodedData::andOperator(unsigned short int nbBits)
00186     {
00187         return (int)pow(2, nbBits)-1;
00188     }
